ability_details: The blaster is automatically reloaded if not equipped for 1.4 seconds.

abilities.official_description: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.
ability_details:
Can be used on both living and dead allies.
Can be cancelled mid-flight by pressing the hotkey once more.
Pressing Jump during Guardian Angel will allow Mercy to propel herself forward, maintaining some momentum.

abilities.official_description: Mercy brings a dead ally back into the fight with full health.
abilities.mspeed: {{tt|-75%|1.375 m/s normally, 2.25 m/s during Valkyrie}} [[movement speed|penalty]]
abilities.heal: Restores full health to a fallen ally
ability_details:
Line of sight does not need to be maintained.
Resurrect is interrupted if Mercy is more than 7 meters away from her target while channeling.
The resurrected players gain 2.25 seconds of invulnerability.
The fallen ally is highlighted on the player's screen.

abilities.official_description: Gain the ability to fly. Mercy’s abilities are enhanced.
abilities.range:
10 meters (chain healing)
+100% range (Guardian Angel, Caduceus Staff)
ability_details:
Mercy passively generates 1% Ult Charge every 3.64 seconds.
{{al|Regeneration}} is no longer interrupted by damage.
{{al|Caduceus Staff}}'s beam branches out from the beam target to nearby allies within line of sight (of the beam target).
Mercy gains vision of enemy health bars if they have taken damage (even if Mercy did not deal the damage herself).
Holding Jump causes Mercy to rise while holding Crouch causes her to descend.

abilities.official_description: Using her left hand, Moira expends biotic energy to heal allies in front of her.
abilities.heal: 70 per second, then lingers to heal {{tt|35 over 2 seconds|17.5 per second}}
ability_details:
Passes through allies and enemies, but not enemy [[barrier]]s.
Like {{proj|proj}}, there is travel time for the spray to reach its destination.
Collision against map geometry and enemy barriers is pinpoint, much like Reinhardts {{al|Fire Strike}}.
Causes a heal over time that begins upon the last application of the spray healing. This allows Moira to heal without expending resources.
Regenerates {{tt|3.36 biotic energy|2.4% of the total energy}} per second while inactive.
Needs at least 8 biotic energy to activate.

abilities.official_description: Her right hand fires a long-range beam weapon that saps enemies’ health, healing Moira and replenishing her biotic energy.
ability_details:
Like {{proj|targeted}} line of sight to an enemies center of mass is required to initiate and maintain the attack.
Like {{proj|beam}} Biotic Grasp is unaffected by {{al|Deflect}}, {{al|Defense Matrix}}, and {{al|Kinetic Grasp}}.
Self-healing and damage are completely separate. Altering the damage does not affect the self heal.
Generates 21.875 biotic energy per second. When combined with the passive regeneration, this becomes 25.235 biotic energy per second (or 18% per second).

abilities.official_description: Moira launches a rebounding biotic sphere; she can choose between a regeneration effect that heals the allies it passes through, or a decay effect that deals damage to enemies.
abilities.damage: 50 per second, up to {{tt|200|Approx.; actually slightly more}}
abilities.heal: 65 per second, up to {{tt|300|Approx.; actually slightly more}}
abilities.pspeed:
20 meters per second
5.5 meters per second while tethered
ability_details:
Bounces off walls.
Pierces [[barrier]]s, but does not target enemies through them.
Damage Orb does not affect enemy [[objects]].
If [[Damage amplification|amplified]], only the rate of damage/healing per second is increased, not the total amount.

abilities.official_description: Moira's movement speed increases while making her invulnerable to damage.
ability_details:
Makes Moira invulnerable and invisible. She can still pick up [[Health Pack]]s.
Cleanses Moira of status and damage over time effects.
Can be used to escape abilities such as [[Graviton Surge]] or [[Gravitic Flux]].

abilities.official_description: Moira channels a long-range beam that heals allies, damages enemies, and bypasses barriers.
Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually.
Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.
abilities.fire_rate:
9 shots per second (firing)
1 orb per 0.52 seconds (charging)
0.6 second recovery

abilities.official_description: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.
ability_details: If Zenyatta loses sight of the player being healed, Orb of Harmony will be returned to Zenyatta after 3 seconds.
Multiple orbs stack additively.

abilities.official_description: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.
ability_details: If Zenyatta loses sight of the player afflicted, Orb of Discord will be returned to Zenyatta after 3 seconds.

abilities.official_description: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
ability_details: Zenyatta is also immune to certain stuns, such as [[Sombra#Hack|Hack]] and [[Earthshatter]].
Ammunition is restored after completion.
